message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet at $13,000? This is a fair compromise.

I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to save as much as I can on this purchase. Can we discuss further?
